content.detailedDescription:
Husband and wife - ufo sighting april 30, 2013
eagle pass, texas -pioneer road (aurora meadows)

i left to pick up my hubby from work at 9:20 pm waited a while, he was supposed to be out by 10. we switched seats and on the way home on pioneer road he says babe whats that in the sky? i started searching, even though i thought he was joking... there was a mix of urgency and excitment in his voice. it wasnt till we were about to turn into aurora meadows that he slowed down and pointed out the lights that i saw what he was talking about but by that time i only saw two orange lights that flickered off and on. they were horizontal then vertical then only one was left then there was nothing. chris got to see a cluster of 5 or 6.
content.summary: Group of 5 or 6 lights

content.detailedDescription: Out walking my dog on street below my house, my husband noticed lights going over house. the two objects were showing identical light patterns to the last sighting. both were heading in same flight path as the first three. i am not sure if it were the same craft or different ones from same group,the ojects were silent and moving really fast.
content.summary: Sane as last night time sighting in april

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were heading to sabina from wilmington and we noticed a flash of light falling from the sky.  it was a couple miles away, prob between 10-20 miles.  the time was 11:45pm and the sky was clear with a sleight haze.  it was in the direction of south and looked like it might have crashed around lees creek. unless the object disintegrated it had to of crashed to the ground, which is more than likely a field.  the object looked like it was on fire, like a shooting star.  the color started out orange and slowly transitioned to green.  it was probably the size of a helicopter.  it sort of left a trail, again it was like a shooting star, but it was leaving more sparks than anything. 

my friend thought it was a small asteroid falling from the sky.  while i don't automatically label things as alien ufo that was my first thought.

exhilarated, my friend and i tried to drive out past sabina to around where we thought it might have crashed (lees creek) but it was too dark to see anything and we didn't have a clear enough idea of where the crash happened. giving up and low on gas we decided to head back toward sabina from snow hill road (an area closer to lees creek) we stopped the car on a lone country road. we got out and saw that 2 blinking lights had arrived in the sky above about where the crash would have been.  they weren't moving or going anywhere.  i would probably say they were small airplanes or helicopters but they weren't moving; although because they were miles away it might have just appeared that they weren't moving when really they were circling.  we stood there for at least 10 minutes and the 2 blinking objects were still there.  they were about as high as a helicopter would be if it were observing, so a couple hundred feet.  i was fiddling with my phone to call a friend and tell him what was going on (as we've shared events like this with each-other)and my friend standing outside with me claimed he saw a flash of green light that lit up the whole sky.  he can not determine where the flash originated from.  

we both wanted to drive out and follow the blinking lights to investigate more but my friends car was almost out of gas and no gas station was open.  the haze in the sky was thickening anyway and we were losing visuals of the blinking objects in the sky. so we just headed home disappointed knowing there was nothing else we could do.
content.summary: A light fell from the sky. it started orange then turned green. hovering objects at sight after.

content.detailedDescription: I have posted here before about multiple triangular craft flying at low altitude above a residential lake where i live. this activity is becoming more frequent and i know that i am not the only witness who lives in this lake. these craft appear triangular and solid with bright white lights resembling search lights on its ventral surface, as well as white and red running lights that flash sequentially. they maintain a more or less straight flight path and fly at very low altitude, less than 500 feet from ground level. i am obviously excited and curious, as this isn't the first sign of ufo activity near this area.
content.summary: Another triangular craft over residential lake.

content.detailedDescription:
At home april 30 2013. girlfriend outside smoking a cig. she yelled for me.
she said look! what is that? it's not a star, is it? i said no. it's too close. it seems to be within our atmosphere. it was also too bright. although it maintained it's position as if it were a star. i went to get the video camera and binoculars. camera was no good. binoc's were great. we could see, very distinctly, four primary colors. blue, green, yellow, red. these colors were emitted as flashes of light. these flashes alternated and were patterned. they seemed to orbit some sort of circular craft. from 9:30 pm to just past 10:35pm, it remained in the same position and just about disappeared in the western horizon as the earth rotates. but then, while i was inside contacting a mufon member (10:35pm til 11:35pm), at 10:50pm she observed the ufo ascend and fly north a great distance at an incredible speed. as if it didn't accelerate, it was just still then moving very, very fast. i went out to see while on the phone with a mufon representative. i did observe it had move a great distance to the north, though i did not see it move to it's new position. i tried to film through the binoc's and have some very shaky video. some good steady scenes, but not close or clear. the colored light are very visible. i had the hardest time zooming in thru the binoc's. please be patient with the video. i watch all the ufo investigative shows, and this is the first time i have ever seen an unidentified flying object. it was and still is an awesome feeling. there are some things people have to see and experience for themselves to understand.
content.summary: Observed object in west-southwest sky. flashing 4 distinct primary colors: blue, green, yellow, red. stationary 1 hour. then moved north.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i had been out for a walk and just came back to our house, i sat down on the porch when my eyes went to the sky above my neighbours house across the street. i had spotted a bright light that was flashing blue and red and white. i was trying to decifer the size of it because it looked larger than a star and planet. i asked my son to get my husband and come out to see it. he also saw it along with my son and couldnt understand what it was. the ufo had moved very slowly behind some trees but we still tracked it. by some time, maybe five to ten minutes my neighbour drove in to his driveway and i alerted him to this ufo. we couldnt see it over at our house so we went into his backyard and saw it keep moving further to the west. he saw the flashing lights and also saw it emit a strobe like light. finally no conclusion on what we saw.It kept moving west and objects were in our way.I think we all would like to know what this was, i really would like to know if anyone saw this.
content.summary: Saw an object flashing in sky above my neighbours house across the street while sitting on my porch

content.detailedDescription: On 4/30 between 10 and 11 pm my fiance and i were sitting on the front porch and saw something in the sky. it was bright white with a red tail coming from the bottom of the object (like a jellyfish tenticle). it looked like a star at first but was brighter than all the stars around it and would dart up and down and side to side at random times. we watched this for about 20 minutes and during this time we watched 3-5 airplanes fly near it, so we knew it was not moving like an airplane. it was staying in the same general spot but moving almost like it was swimming in the sky. when we went outside an hour later, it was still there. at 330 am it had moved south (unsure how far). on may 1, 2013 at about 10 pm we observed the same kind of object in about the same spot it was the previous night. we looked to the south of the origianlly spotted object and there was another one! we then looked to the west and saw 3 more. then spotting 2 to the north. one that was north west of where we are was lower than the rest and the light tail was more vivid. they all seemed to have the same movements. i did't have a direct encounter with any of them, so there were no feelings except fascination. we have not lost sight of the objects. they are still there.
content.summary: 7 hovering bright white objects with red tails coming off the bottom like a jellyfish

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friends house going home when i see a car waiting for me. they open the door and tell me i better get into the car. once in they give me drugs to smoke crystal meth. quickly we arrive to the destination. i am further drugged with chemicals not found anywhere on the street. black ops chemicals. then i am forced to sit on the ground and wait, what i was waiting for was an apppature in spacetime from which stepped out an alpha draconian. i wasn't standing next to it alone, a tall blond looks like a perfect specimen for a human was there. we both touched the head of the creature. then it disappeared. i was put to sleep and taken to my home. end of event.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was abducted to a point near my house let go and then prepared fro the encounter

content.detailedDescription:
1) i was in my backyard with my boyfriend having a smoke.
2)we were actually looking at the stars and talking about them , when they appeared out of no where.
3)at first i thought it was a shooting star but then i realised it was 4-5 objects in a diagonal line going straight.
4)they appeared out of no where , at first i thought it was a shooting star until i realise there were 4-5 objects on a perfect diagonal but going straight ... my bf also believed they were connected to eachother. 
5) i freaked out wanting to go inside , because it hasnt been the first time i've seen something creepy like that , while my bf was excited and amazed that he finally saw something like that. i was shocked that we both saw the same thing. my bf is obsessed with space and stars and is really smart when it comes to those things  and was trying to think of possible explanations to what we saw but he couldn't think of one that would be possible.
6) from the angle of the sky we saw them on there is a huge pine tree that blocked our view but also it seemed like the disingrated really fast . it was all soo fast that we couldnt even take it in.
content.summary: Happened really fast, sooo strange and unexplainable

content.detailedDescription:
Objeto observado 
objeto semejante a un diamante con luz roja en un extremo , a gran altitud 
fabrizzio chavarria velazquez mufon bolivia
content.summary: Objeto semejante a un diamante con luz roja en un extremo

content.detailedDescription: Checking out night sky. sighted venus & mars at about 2115 when first noticed sphere glowing blue-green and red. after 1/2 hour it was joined by another on western horizon. by 2200 southern most object disappeared below tree line as the other traveled slowly north. as we turned away we noticed a third object with similar lights hovering in the east. it did not appear to be traveling toward us. we sighted all three objects with binoculars and concluded none to be planets, stars, or conventional aircraft of any kind we are familiar with. we were astounded and talked about it briefly. my son was skeptical, but could not account for objects especially as we sighted an airplane (not jet engined) flying low (about 1000-2000 ft.) to our south going west to east. normally helicopters fly to nearby hospital, but objects were definitely not choppers, and pavepaws radar base, coast guard base, and air national guard are about ten miles away to the south on cape cod, but no conventional aircraft came from that direction. these objects were larger than venus, moved slowly or hovered for long durations, and then moved off. could not have been saturn as that planet does not appear until close to dawn.
content.summary: Second consecutive night of observation of object traveling east-west slowly. second night sighted three; two west one continued west other north; third approached from east.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back yard with 2 friends at about 10:00pm and we were sitting by the fire pit in my back yard. we were looking at the stars and the scenery around us when we noticed a red light with a white light on top of it so we thought it was just a airplane. 

we forgot about it and then a minute or 2 later it got closer and we herd a very low humming noise. we got up and walked closer as it was coming closer behind the tree line. when it got into view over my house we see a large oval object about 10ft over the tree line and about 100ft or so long and 50ft or more wide, it had three dome lights evenly spaced out down the under side of the object with the brightest white light i have ever seen, the object was a dark grey or dark black in color and made a very faint humming noise and was moving very slow maby about 2-5 mph. 

there was also white light beams coming from the object at different areas of the object scanning the ground and my house, the white light was like a laser beam it stayed the same brightness and same consistency from where it exited the object to where it touched the ground. after the object had made its way past my house it made a 180 degree spin as it was already moving. i felt so scared and my head hurt so bad, i started feeling sick to my stomach and i had goose bumps all over my body. me and my two friends were silent the whole time and we didn't know what to think about what just happened. 

the object continued north at the same speed and eventually the lights on the object got a little bit brighter and it picked up speed incredibly fast and was out of site in a matter of seconds.

 just writing this statement of what i saw or when i tell people of what happened that night i get goose bumps and it gets hard to breath. i will never ever forget that night and i can remember that night like it just happened yesterday.

 i'm not sure if it was aliens or human technology that we don't yet know of, but it was something that was not known yet to us all.
content.summary: Ufo flying over house with 2 other friends observing event

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was outside at 11:12 last night when i looked to the north and i saw a strange light in the sky then i saw what looked like a shooting star come past it or from it it just emitted for a second.
i was looking at the stars because i thought i seen a cluster of stars and the milky way in the sky at the time.
a plane but it made no sound
it was flying from east to west over the highway and the road that i live on
i had thought i saw at first a shooting star and i thought it had hit the object then i thought it had come off the object
it just flew to the west over a road and highway
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unknown object in night sky emitting a light

content.detailedDescription:
In 53 years i have never seen any object in the sky like this orb. it's brightness and extremely slow movement across the sky was unprecedented in my experience. 

my partner debbie and i were on the balcony porch of our home in gerton, nc in the early evening of fri. apr. 26, 2013 when a remarkably bright ball of amber light appeared beneath low cloud cover to the southeast of our position. a gentle rain had just stopped. the orb appeared to be a ball of contain orange burning fire in the sky. as the single orb moved slowly toward us i could see that the circular shape of the light was well defined. it looked like a perfectly round glass ball of blazing light. the orb was not part of any craft but flew on its own through the sky. my initial thought was that what i was observing was inconceivable: a wingless and material orb of light flying under its own power. it was certainly not a balloon as it did not float or move about with the quite strong breeze blowing after the rain. the orb maintained a steady course. i ran indoors and got a pair of binoculars. i then ran outside into a large open meadow next to our home from which i had a clear view of the slowly flying orb. through the binoculars i could clearly see a smoothly rounded amber orb attached to nothing else passing through the sky just beneath a low light-grey cloud cover. 

as the orb drew closer to our position it became more distinct. its slow passage under its own power through the sky was inexplicable. i had the bizarre sense that i was witnessing something not of this world given the fact that the orbs flight seemed physically impossible. 

it passed by our position turning away from us to the north and finally rose up into the low clouds and gradually disappeared out of sight. i remained in the meadow for some time but never saw the orb come out from the cloud cover.
content.summary: Two persons observed very bright amber/red orb flying very slowly above a wooded ridge moving toward our location beneath low cloud cover. orb move along a single direct flight path for approx. 5 mins. orb rose and disappeared ne into clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
The fact that i saw a mothership ufo in recently in colorado is of no particular importance.  i am taking this method of contact due to the fact that i am very disappointed to find that stan friedman's phone has no more space for leaving messages, and i am not confident that i actually have his e-mail address.  
i am watching the hearing on disclosure on streamer, and a question arose just now, regarding "if there is anyone still alive who actually saw a body at the roswell incident.  i am well acquainted with a woman who was at the site because her son was stationed there with the air force.  i have known her for many years, and have no reason to believe she is lying or that she imagined this.  if mr. friedman could contact me, i will be glad to share what i know about this person and what she shared with me.

i do not want to provide details at this time as not of consequence.
content.summary: Mothership sited through window of bus

content.detailedDescription: On the night of 4-29-2013 at appx. 8:45 pm i was working in front of my garage, i looked to the east (270 degrees) and saw what looked like a meteor falling from the sky. after a few seconds i determined that this was to low in the horizon and the speed was to slow. i observed it as it approached me, it was a yellow glowing sphere that almost appeared to be on fire, as it came closer to me it slowed down and turned due north ( 0 degrees ) and proceeded till i lost sight. the best thing about this is that it did another pass in the same speed and direction appx. 5 minutes later. this had also occurred on 8-30-2008, observed by a motorist traveling east bound on i80 mufon case # 12347.
content.summary: Observed yellow glowing shere low on the horizon, moving slowly

content.detailedDescription:
April 30, 2013, from 9:00p.M. to 9:45p.M. central time, my wife and i viewed a very bright star like object south-west of our house, approximately thirty degrees up from horizon.  my wife noticed the star like object while walking from garage to house.  she asked me to "quit watching television"..."come outside"..."look at this thing". 
using some trees located between object and our view point for reference, the object was stationary the entire thirty minute observation.  unaided eyes observation, the object was the brightest star in the sky and twinkled and changed color.  using binoculars to view the object, a definite circular shape was observed and the color of the object cycled between red and blue.  at about 9:15p.M., my wife mentioned "light rays" emitted by the object.  i had the binoculars and i observed a yellow/gold cloud several times bigger than the red/blue object directly west(to the right) of the object.  the yellow/gold "cloud" vanished within seconds.
i picked up the binoculars at 9:10p.M. and over the next twenty minutes i noticed the circular objects diameter slowly decreased by half...As if the object was moving in a direction 180 degrees from our point of view.  using the binoculars was hurting my eyes and i went in the house at 9:30p.M.. my wife watched the thing for another fifteen minutes.  at 11:00p.M., my wife went outside to view the object.  she came back in the house one minute later and reported the object was no longer visible.  
i checked a sky map for bright stars or planets.  no bright stars or planets listed for the south-west part of the sky.  i will check tonight (may 1, 2013)the south-west sky for the blue/red object. maybe there really is some bright star or planet not listed on sky maps...Eh?
content.summary: Easily brightest star in sky,  5 second cycle of blue/red color change.

content.detailedDescription:
Some time during the last week of this past jan. during the evening, my husband and i were sitting in our family room watching tv. i decided to go to the living room to have a cigarette as my husband doesn't smoke. the living room is in a different section of the house separated by three walls and 3 doorways. i was sitting in a chair in the southeast corner of the house with 2 windows to my left and to the right and also a door to the right. there was a lamp on to my left as well as a dim light across the room near the door going back in the direction of the family room. i heard what i thought were voices but then realized it was an owl! we have lived here for 20 years and have never seen or heard any owls here! their hoos were, it seemed coming from all sides and were only hooing one at a time. example: from right, hoo-hoo..Hoo,,,hoo..Hoo, from left, hoo, hoo... hoo.. hoo and so on.
marveling at the loudness of the hoos and the seemingly numerous owls that had popped in for a visit, i went to the windows to see if i could pinpoint the locations. when i looked out into the darkness, they stopped, then i walked away toward the family room and they gave another series of hoos. i entered the family room where i found my husband looking toward a large window somewhat at alert and with the volume muted on the tv. i told him what i heard and he said he heard them as well. i observed his body language more closely and determined that he was rather alarmed and startled which i found satisfying as i felt the same. we seemed to both de at the same time to go out with a flashlight to investigate but i stayed behind and walked quickly back to the living room to watch his progress. i didn't see him so i came back to the family room and he was already coming back through the sliding glass door. he seemed frustrated and agitated and stammered, "those things are long gone!" i was quite startled because he had never progressed any farther than a few steps onto the patio. he had never gone all the way around to the front of the house where the sounds came from. i was disappointed so i went back to the living room without turning on lights this time to try to hear them again. i peered out the living rom door and i saw a huge disc in the sky barely moving coming straight from over our house going east! it had lights randomly blinking red, blue yellow and green!
i went back to the family room and told my husband, he seemed totally uninterested and was watching tv again! i looked out the sliding glass doors that he had just a few moments ago re-entered and the craft was still quietly gliding, well, creeping along over the field next to our house! i thought how odd was because it seemed that there were small airplanes buzzing around it! i thought it would be in the news or something but never was. anyway, i grabbed a pair of binoculars and seemed to be fumbling a bit trying to get the caps off. i looked at the craft and it was not focusing. i was suddenly extremely fatigued and had to go sit down. i glanced out the door and could still see it and asked my husband if he didn't want to see the ufo, he said, "no!". that was it. we said no more and forgot about it.
content.summary: Husband and i in separate rooms both heard loud owl hoots, husband went outside with light, returned quickly, then i saw craft leaving from above house. moved very slowly

content.detailedDescription: I live up on a hill that overlooks miles of low, flat land.  i had just laid back down facing an open window overlooking the neighborhoods below. i was slmost asleep when i noticed a bright light shining on me through my closed eyes.  i opened my eyes, woke my husband and we watched a silent object that didn't seem very far away move south across the sky.  the object seemed to be at the same level as us.  it kept its beam of light facing our bedroom for about 10 seconds and then it moved the beam facing the direction it was headed...South.  it just kept moving south until it was out of our view.  i did not get up to watch it through a different window as i felt paralyzed with fear.  my husband walked around the house a little just to check to make sure doors were locked, but he also did not look out another window to watch it go.
content.summary: Silent object flying low headed south at consistent speed shined light in bedroom window

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 2200 hrs a bright spherical object appeared in the eastern sky just above the tree line. the object stopped in it's flight path and "hovered" over the tree line for approximately 1 minute, then changed direction and headed north west until it was out of sight. viewed through binoculars the object appeared as a bright sphere that emitted/glowed light in all directions. no visible strobes and no engine noise. the size and elevation of the object was unknown. the wx conditions were clear and there were no visible clouds. 

object was first sighted through a kitchen window, by my father who yelled to me to come view the object. we stood outside with a pair of binoculars and viewed the object as it moved westward and then north west. the object defied explanation as it was not acting like a common airplane, helicopter, satellite or common celestial phenomena (shooting star or fireball) and thus falls into an unexplained category.
content.summary: Bright starlike object over hampton, nh

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home, and when i look up at the sky and there was 3 glowing orange orbs that appeared to be in a triangle and when i blinked they were in a straight line. they were way to close together to be airplanes abd i have never seen a plane have such a blindingly bright light. i couldve stared at them forever, except i wouldve crashed my car in the process. i have never been so scared/curious in my life. i am not a star gazer. in fact i am completely skeptical on the whole e.T. thing, but i know what i saw.
content.summary: Most frightened i have ever been

content.detailedDescription:
This has taken me some time to report. somewhere in 2002-2003, i was out getting the mail and having a cigarette, and looked up for a second, and saw something unusual. it looked like a full, silver orb, hovering in the sky to the ssw direction, maybe a few miles away and unknown feet above. i wasn't sure if it was an airplane or something at the time, but as i observed it, about 15-30 seconds later, the object ascended rapidly both horizontally & vertically into the sky in the same position it was, almost on a 45 degree angle.

i saw a photo of the same object on the internet that was from glendale, arizona, but cannot remember where, but it was the same object i saw.

it has been many years and didn't thank anything of it, but maybe it could be of help to you gentlemen.
content.summary: Silver orb in sky

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My husband and i had taken our dogs into the backyard before bringing them in for the night.  we were sitting on the back porch discussing vacation plans and laughing at the dogs.  we had been there for several minutes, and as we talked i was noticing the stars and asked about one that was flickering, i wondering if it was a satellite.  then i noticed a plane flying over from the north.  that was when my eyes caught the dark triangle smoothly and slowly moving across the sky.  from where i was sitting on the porch, the view to the sky is blocked by our privacy fence, and the power lines can be seen just above our fence line, they run along the road beyond an empty lot behind our home.  i immediately jumped from my chair and ran forward, assuming it was some kind of car lights reflected on the power lines, hoping it was just reflected car lights.  but then i could see even more clearly the large and very dark triangle shape with the pale lights at its edges.  this thing seemed so massive, or low in the sky, or both!  it was terrifying.  it was high enough up and close enough to us that i could see it was triangular in shape- and i could make out pale, very dim lights larger on the side closer to me, and almost like i was just seeing a part of each of the lights on the further side. i was so shocked and could not believe i was really seeing this thing.  i was yelling something about it (probably a string of bad words) and a vague area to my husband, trying to describe it or something.  he didn't see it at all.  it had happened so fast and it turned north and seemed to vanish.  i am sweating, and very shaken up.  i don't like this at all.  that isn't strong enough language to describe how fearful i am about what i just saw.  i really hope and pray that there is something on the news later about a secret flight of some new jet or something. not good.
content.summary: Black triangle darker than the night sky but with spots of light around its edges, crossed sky and then veered more nw seemed to disappear

content.detailedDescription: I just drop off my kid at practice coming down the 32 flemingsburg rd   going down to tow got to were vet n a sawmill are was on the hill getting ready to go down the hill n a big white  disk shape it had a point in front  sharp like a knife to likev3/4 of the way back it was dome on top n flat on bottom till the end it went back to a point  it mite have change shape or mb cus real shinny white but it look like it was i only seen it for a few seconds not the only one i seen here in morehead ky seen a cigar shape goin slow on my sons birthday in 09  ex my kids n nabior seen that one
content.summary: Look like a big cloud going east to west seen for couple seconds no wings n sounds white n color  clouds don't move n  big planes don't ffly at treetop level

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in the back patio of my house smoking a cigarette. i saw what i thought was a plane coming from the direction of lake michigan. as it got closer i realized that it was not a plane as it was saucer shaped and flying just above the trees. the object glowed extremely bright white light over its entire surface. it passed just along the side of columbus avenue. the flight path was mostly constant though it moved down behind the top of a tree before adjusting its flight path back up just above tree top level. the object was angled in the direction it moved roughly 30 degrees. the object flew slow and made no sound. i watched it until i could no longer see it. i came into the house to try to look at it through a window but lost visual contact. this is not the first ufo i've seen relatively close but this one needs to be reported. you may use my name. you may investigate on the property. please call or email first. you may contact me if you wish to. i tried. to take pictures and video but i'm only using a ipod and it only caught a pin point of light, not the entire object.
content.summary: Went outside saw ufo near constant flight path very bright white

content.detailedDescription:
I am not the witness, but this is what he told me when i saw him looking out the window in my living room at 11:11 on april 27th 2013:

he and my roommate were sitting on the couch in front of our living room picture window.  he happened to see a random orange/red light in the distance.  he watched it hover and then move up and down erratically with no seeming path.  he then told my roommate and they turned off the lights and began to watch.  it continued to move erratically for a minute or so before i came upstairs and it dipped down before disappearing as i entered the room.  they also mentioned that it changed from orange to more red as it moved. there was a quiet excitement tinged with concern/fear they both felt.  i was very disappointed to have missed it.  it was too far away for them to get a clear view of the object, distinguish a shape, or hear if it made any noise.  we all discussed it for a few minutes afterwards, trying to find an explanation, but we couldn't think of anything that would move like that.  it did not seem to be a reflection of any kind, the light seemed to be emitted from the object itself.

i have done a little research and have found nothing referring to this incident, nor have i found anyone else who saw what my roommate and friend saw.
content.summary: Light hovered and moved erratically, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Saw three lights in an equilateral triangle formation on the way back to se foster from lake oswego at about 8:30pm. at that time of year in portland there is still quite a bit of light at this hour. i was in a car with three other people all of whom witnessed the same phenomenon. i first noticed three bright lights as we went over the ross island bridge; i was looking back in the direction from which we had come, sw towards lake oswego. the light at the top of the formation was white and brightest while the other two were red-orange. i pointed them out to the other passengers and we all, save the driver, watched them intently as we continued driving along towards powell blvd. they appeared to be hovering variably up or down in the sky, and we pulled over at around se 25th & powell to watch them, realizing they we could not explain the lights' intensity nor their motion. one by one they disappeared, starting with the dimmer (although still very bright) two on the bottom, and finally the bright white light which crowned the formation. after they did not reappear for about five minutes we continued driving to se ~60th and foster, at which point they would have been invisible at our altitude. this makes me think they must have been about 200-300 ft high in the sky. we were all pretty convinced we had not been observing planes or helicopters given the eventual disappearance of the lights.
content.summary: 3 lights in triangle formation, disappear one by one.

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd by phone: 

i was outside taking a smoke break at approximately 10:30 pm last night when something caught my eye to the northeast.  i saw eight balls of orange glowing light moving along at a very slow pace just about 15' above the ground and about 35' to 40' from where i was standing. they were not very bright, but had a glow about them with a defined edge then a softer edge around it, like some kind of a heat mirage.  there was absolutely no sound at all and if i hadn't have been in that spot at that exact moment i would have missed them!  they were the size of a basketball or larger - maybe up to 3' in diameter- and all the same size.  there was no structure or appendages, and they were not sky lanterns, no flame flickering or candle underneath them, or anything like that, just solid glowing balls of light that moved up and down by as much as 10', but always keeping in a straight line path as if they had some purpose in mind and were under intelligent control.  i was shocked and couldn't move from my spot - and didn't think to grab my camera. my dog sat watching them as well.  unfortunately, no one else was around to see this.  i live in a rural area with no neighbors within sight.  as the balls of light moved past my pond i could see their reflection in the water.  it was a very eerie sight! the objects moved to the southeast and out of sight.  i watched them for about 20 minutes. they moved extremely slowly, at about 5 mph.  my wife and i have seen unexplained objects in the sky in the past but nothing this close to us! i'd really like to know if anyone else saw this.
content.summary: Large orange balls of light moving slowly over farm

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping soundly when i began to wake up due to sounds from the kitchen; i was flat on my back with two pillows under my head. i normally am asleep on my side, when a series of distinct sounds began to wake me up. the sound was coming from our kitchen. 

my first thought was my son might have gotten out of bed, for the first time and was opening and closing drawers. i decided to get up out of bed but i was immediately and totally paralyzed by a buzzing feeling at the base of my brain.  

immediately my mind focused away from the noises to what i thought i was having, which was a stroke or brain hemorrhage or some sort of serious problem. i could not open my eyes i could not move my legs or any part of my body. the buzzing did not hurt. 
my mind was 100% totally awake yet i was unable to move my body.  i attempted, at first, to move my feet then legs. then my arms and get up. but i absolutely could not.  it was like a weight on my body. there was no pain. i could not speak. 

i decided to try to open my eyes. i could not. i concentrated on opening just one eye which was my right eye. it took every bit of trying to get the eye lid to open, as it started to open. i noticed a creature with its arms extended over me at my knees. its hands were glowing -yellow greenish. 

immediately i knew it was not my son! this has to be an alien! i was completely amazed. i struggled to keep my eye open. suddenly this thing, moved out of the room directly through the wall! it moved fast, and was silent. the fact that it went through the wall was overwhelming.

the paralysis quickly went away. physically i felt fine yet amazed at the event and experience i had.  i went into my son���s room to check on him, he seemed fine. i walked to the kitchen and around then returned to the bedroom and went back to bed. i chose not to wake my wife who had been next to me the whole time.

i kept this experience to myself, briefly but seriously mentioning it the next day. three days later i became really afraid and since that time i have just tried to deal with not knowing what this thing was and what it maybe had done to me.
content.summary: Creature next to my bed supressing me.

content.detailedDescription: I was going out side for a smoke and i always look up at the stars and i saw something come towards me. it did not make any sounds but did see a plain go by 30 minutes before this abject appeared. it was going on a strait line like it was going on a mission. did not stop just kept going. but i see many of this abject almost every night. i always go out side for a smoke and every chance i get i look up. it���s a small town and it���s not as bright as a city so you can see them.
content.summary: It look like it had a mission
